group_1.textRight: I was wonderin' what you were gonna show me.
This is more than I expected...

group_1.textLeft: Please tell Alina more about it.

group_1.textCenter: I was the middle child between two brothers,@so I'm pretty boyish in nature.
I like girly things, but they don't fit my image.
I had a whole thing about it.
I couldn't even get into a@relationship because of it...
Like, I didn't have the courage@to take that first step.
In any case, I wished for the courage to confess@my feelings to someone I fell in love with...
And so I became a Magical Girl.
But...that love ended before I could confess.
I'm always in the wrong place at the wrong time, I...
I lost sight of the meaning of being a Magical Girl.
I know that Magical Girls are@fated to become Witches...
Honestly, I became bitter and resentful over@this chain of disasters that kept piling up.
That portrait of my Witch reminded me of that...

group_1.textLeft: Do you still regret becoming a Magical Girl?

group_1.textRight: Nope...@[chara:101001:lipSynch_0][wait:1.0][chara:101001:lipSynch_1][chara:101001:cheek_0][chara:101001:face_mtn_ex_010.exp3.json][chara:101001:motion_100]I guess you could say I can't regret it.
There's lots of girls I never would've@met if I hadn't become a Magical Girl.
So if I were to regret becoming one...
That'd be saying there was no@value in meeting 'em, yeah?
I'm so grateful to have met them all.
So no, I don't have any regrets.@I just accept it all and move on.
...Huh, I've become someone@who can just shrug it all off.
Maybe it's 'cause I got tossed into such a cruel fate.

group_1.textLeft: Is your positivit√† your energia for living?

group_1.textRight: Nah, it's just how I keep my mindset in check.
It lets me keep going with@a good outlook on my bad timing,
and it's led to me broadening@my sense of what I can do.
'Cause it means I can help@other Magical Girls if I want to.
...Even me being the way I am,@those girls still need me.
So I'm not gonna waver. I'm gonna@stand up strong 'til the very end.

group_1.textLeft: Hmm... Then the reason you@will not give in to terrore...
...is because you have a future to look forward to.
